import pandas as pd
from datetime import datetime

# parquet_path = './data/train.parquet'
# df.to_parquet(parquet_path)
# Write file: ./data/train.parquet | time: 0:00:32.726580

s_time = datetime.now()
print('Start:', s_time)

# Add Data url: https://www.kaggle.com/wanngide/ubiquan-parquet-dataset
df = pd.read_parquet('../input/ubiquan-parquet-dataset/train.parquet')

print(df.head(10))
print(type(df))
e_time = datetime.now()
print('Time: {}'.format(e_time-s_time))
